hanzi-su-wiki:
南

Значения

Юг

Мнемоника

  • Пробираться на юге страны через джунгли, раздвигая рогатиной 羊 свисающие 冂 и дающие новые побеги 十 лианы.

  • Два растения растут в саду с видом на юг.
purpleculture_pinyin:
nán
south
юг
rtega_mnemonic:
南南RS
X		south
  • known for its fertile soil where sprouting 丷 seeds 干 yield many 十 bags 冂; con.: fattened: 献

南南RS
  • south, southern part, southward (when the sun shines much 十 in the south there's much 十 work in the fields 冂 to gather seeds 干 and vegetables 丷 with a pitchfork 𢆉)
purpleculture_examples:
南京 [ nán jīng ]: Nanjing subprovincial city on the Changjiang, capital of Jiangsu province 江苏 ; capital of China at different historical periods
河南 [ hé nán ]: Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫 , capital Zhengzhou 郑州
南方 [ nán fāng ]: south; the southern part of the country; the South
湖南 [ hú nán ]: Hunan province in south central China, abbr. 湘 , capital Changsha 长沙
云南 [ yún nán ]: Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇 or 云 , capital Kunming 昆明

heisig_chinese_memo: South of my belt leads to good fortune and happiness.
heisig_constituent: south, ten, needle, belt, happiness, ten, needle, stand up, vase, ten2, needle2
heisig_story: Belt . . . happiness. Note how the belt runs through the middle of happiness.
koohiiStory1: South of my belt leads to happiness.
koohiiStory2: In the south (Southern Alabama, Southern Africa, picture any south, but choose one and stick with it) "they measure happyness by the belt". If someone has a larger belly (and a longer belt), it is believed they are well fed and thus are happy.
jp_example_words:
南(なん): south
南極(なんきょく): south pole, Antarctic
南米(なんべい): South America
南北(なんぼく): south and north
南(みなみ): South, proceeding south
jp_readingExamples: 南北 (なんぼく), 南端 (なんたん), 指南 (しなん), 南 (みなみ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The cross you're holding above your head to keep your horns dry keeps pulling you south. Probably because it's warmer and less damp down south.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look down and see the compass pointing south and feel the cross pulling you in that direction.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You finally make it down south, and it is dry, but you're really hungry. When you try to find southern food you realize every single store is only selling naan (なん).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine being in the south and taking big bites of naan. It tastes good, but now your mouth is dry just like your horns. Too dry...
Ru_Notes: Стороны света: 北 [きた] север, 南 [みなみ] юг, 西 [にし] запад, 東 [ひがし] восток.
Ru_Radicals: 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 十 (десять), 干 (сухой)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ten (十) wide (冂) yen (￥) are in the south
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: South of my belt leads to good fortune and happiness.
humanum_full_description_en:
A type of musical instrument like a bell with a golden inscription, the mouth is down, hollow, and the original meaning is a musical instrument (Guo Moruo, Tang Lan). Under the guise of a locality word, it means the south. " South " in ancient books has the original meaning of musical instruments, "The Book of Songs. Xiaoya. "Drum Bell": "Drum Bell Qinqin, Drums, Drums, Qin, and Shengjing have the same sound. To the south of Ya, but not arrogant." " Ya " and " South " are relative texts, and both indicate musical instruments. " Ya " is a percussion instrument shaped like a lacquer tube. It is one of the instruments played by ancient musicians, "Zhou Li. Chunguan Zongbo. "Master Sheng": "Master Sheng teaches Lun, Sheng, Xun, Xuan, Xiao, Xun, Xuan, Guan, Xuan Xuan, Ying, and Ya, to teach the happiness." Zheng Sinong: "Elegance, like a lacquer. And 弇口". It means that the master of Sheng is in charge of the professor playing the instruments such as the yu, sheng, and xun, and percussing the instruments such as 牍, Ying and Ya. "Book of Rites. "Wen Wang Shi Zi": "Xu Drum Nan", " Xu " is the official name, which means that Xu beat Nan this kind of instrument.

The oracle bone inscription refers to the south. "Compilation" 36975: "East soil receives the year, southern soil receives the year, west soil receives the year, and north soil receives the year." Also used as a place name. It was also used as a sacrifice. Guo Moruo and Tang Lan interpreted it as "豰", meaning a small dolphin, which was extended to a young animal. "Collection" 14315: "Maonan, scalper." Means the slaughter of young livestock and scalpers.

Inscriptions on the south, the Sanshi disc: "From the water to the south, to the big lake." It means to cross from the water to the south to the big lake. Wuwei: "Wang Zhengnan corpse (Yi)." Because "Nanyi" is located in the Jianghuai area, it is also called "Nanhuai corpse (Yi)".

Han silk scripts pretend to be " male ", "Mawangdui. Line 353 of "Fifty-Two Sick Recipes": "Yinan (male) Tong (child) is weak (drowning) one and a half buckets and a half" means taking a bucket and a half of boy's urine. "Zuo Zhuan. The Thirteenth Year of Zhao Gong: "Uncle Zheng, a man too." "Mandarin. Zhou Yuzhong", "Confucius' Family Language. "Sheng Lun" " male " as " South ".

"Said Wen": "South, from the wood to the south, there are branches and any branches. From 𣎵, 𢆉 sound. 𡴖, ancient Chinese."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The " South " in the Jia Jin inscription is like an instrument like Zhong Piao, borrowed as a locality word to indicate the south.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象鐘鎛一類樂器，口在下，中空，本義是樂器(郭沫若、唐蘭)。假借為方位詞，表示南方。古書中「南」有表示樂器的本義，《詩經．小雅．鼓鐘》：「鼓鍾欽欽，鼓瑟鼓琴，笙磬同音。以雅以南，以籥不僭。」「雅」、「南」相對為文，皆表示樂器。「雅」是一種形狀好像漆筒的敲擊樂器，是古代樂師演奏的樂器之一，《周禮．春官宗伯．笙師》：「笙師掌教龡竽、笙、塤、籥、簫、篪、篴、管，舂牘、應、雅，以教祴樂。」鄭司農：「雅，狀如漆筩而弇口」。意謂笙師掌管教授吹奏竽、笙、塤等樂器，敲擊牘、應、雅等樂器。《禮記．文王世子》：「胥鼓南」，「胥」是官名，表示胥敲擊南這種樂器。

　　甲骨文表示南方，《合集》36975：「東土受年，南土受年，西土受年，北土受年。」「南土受年」，表示南方的土地得到好收成。又用作地名。又用作祭品，郭沫若、唐蘭釋讀為「豰」，表示小豚，引申為幼小的牲畜。《合集》14315：「卯南，黃牛。」表示宰割幼小的牲畜和黃牛。

　　金文表示南方，散氏盤：「自瀗涉，以南，至于大湖。」表示從瀗水渡過，向南，直至大湖。無㠱簋：「王征南尸(夷)。」由於「南夷」位處江淮地區，又稱「南淮尸(夷)」，翏生盨：「王征南淮尸(夷)。」

　　漢帛書通假作「男」，《馬王堆．五十二病方》第353行：「以南(男)潼(童)弱(溺)一斗半」，表示取用一斗半男童的童子尿。《左傳．昭公十三年》：「鄭伯，男也。」《國語．周語中》、《孔子家語．正論》「男」作「南」。

　　《說文》：「南，艸木至南方，有枝任也。从𣎵，𢆉聲。𡴖，古文。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文「南」象鐘鎛一類樂器，假借為方位詞，表示南方。

A type of musical instrument like a bell with a golden inscription, the mouth is down, hollow, and the original meaning is a musical instrument (Guo Moruo, Tang Lan). Under the guise of a locality word, it means the south. " South" in ancient books has the original meaning of musical instruments, "The Book of Songs. Xiaoya. "Drum Bell": "Drum Bell Qinqin, Drums, Drums, Qin, and Shengjing have the same sound. To the south of Ya, but not arrogant." " Ya" and " South" are relative texts, and both indicate musical instruments. " Ya" is a percussion instrument shaped like a lacquer tube. It is one of the instruments played by ancient musicians, "Zhou Li. Chunguan Zongbo. "Master Sheng": "Master Sheng teaches Lun, Sheng, Xun, Xuan, Xiao, Xun, Xuan, Guan, Xuan Xuan, Ying, and Ya, to teach the happiness." Zheng Sinong: "Elegance, like a lacquer. And 弇口". It means that the master of Sheng is in charge of the professor playing the instruments such as the yu, sheng, and xun, and percussing the instruments such as 牍, Ying and Ya. "Book of Rites. "Wen Wang Shi Zi": "Xu Drum Nan", " Xu" is the official name, which means that Xu beat Nan this kind of instrument. The oracle bone inscription refers to the south. "Compilation" 36975: "East soil receives the year, southern soil receives the year, west soil receives the year, and north soil receives the year." Also used as a place name. It was also used as a sacrifice. Guo Moruo and Tang Lan interpreted it as " 豰", meaning a small dolphin, which was extended to a young animal. "Collection" 14315: "Maonan, scalper." Means the slaughter of young livestock and scalpers. Inscriptions on the south, the Sanshi disc: "From the water to the south, to the big lake." It means to cross from the water to the south to the big lake. Wuwei: "Wang Zhengnan corpse (Yi)." Because "Nanyi" is located in the Jianghuai area, it is also called "Nanhuai corpse (Yi)". Han silk scripts pretend to be " male", "Mawangdui. Line 353 of "Fifty-Two Sick Recipes": "Yinan (male) Tong (child) is weak (drowning) one and a half buckets and a half" means taking a bucket and a half of boy's urine. "Zuo Zhuan. The Thirteenth Year of Zhao Gong: "Uncle Zheng, a man too." "Mandarin. Zhou Yuzhong", "Confucius' Family Language. "Sheng Lun" " male" as " South". "Said Wen": "South, from the wood to the south, there are branches and any branches. From 𣎵, 𢆉 sound. 𡴖, ancient Chinese."

南字的基本解释

南
nán
方向，早晨面对太阳，右手的一边，与“北”相对：南北。南方。南面。南国（指中国南部）。南陲（南部边疆）。南极。南半球。
姓。
北

南
nā
〔南无（
北m?）〕佛教用语，意思是合掌稽首，表示对佛尊敬或皈依，常加于佛、菩萨名的前面，如“南南阿弥陀佛”、“南南观世音菩萨”。
北

南字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nán］
［《廣韻》那含切，平覃，泥。］
(1)方位名。和“北”相对。
(2)南方；南国。
(3)现代又因发展中国家多在南半球，习称“南方”，省称“南”；发达国家多在北半球，习称“北方”，省称“北”。如：南北对话、南南合作。
(4)南去；向南行。
(5)古代南方舞乐的名称。
(6)官爵名。后多作“男”。
(7)明代对今南京的省称。
(8)我国西南地区少数民族对女子的美称。
(9)姓。唐有南霁云。见《新唐书·忠义传上》。
[②]［nā］
［《廣韻》那含切，平覃，泥。］
见“南2無”。

南字的英文翻译

◎ 南
south

南字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【十字部】　南； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页157第05
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?那含切，音男。【說文】草木至南方，有枝任也。【徐曰】南方主化育，故曰主枝任也。【前漢·律歷志】太陽者，南方。南，任也。陽氣任養物，於時爲夏。【白虎通】八月之律，謂之南呂何。南者，任也。言陽氣尚有任生薺麥也。又樂名。【詩·小雅】以雅以南。【韻會】南亦雅樂名，猶九夏也，南夏皆文明之方，故名南。周南召南，亦樂名。又姓。【韻會】魯大夫南遺。【宋書·律志】班左並馳，董南齊轡。又雙南，金也。【范仲淹金在鎔賦】英華旣發，雙南之價彌高。鼓鑄未停，百鍊之功可待。又【翻譯名義】合掌作禮曰和南。【淳化帖衞夫人書】衞和南。又【韻補】叶尼心切，音寧。【詩·邶風】遠送于南。沈重讀。【陸雲·喜霽賦】朱明啓?，凱風自南，復火正之舊司，黜后土于重隂。

南字的起名意思

：南方，早晨面对太阳，右手的一边。

〔Nano (
North m?)] Buddhist term meaning to put one's palms together to show respect or refuge to the Buddha. It is often added in front of the names of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, such as "South-South Amitabha" and "South-South Avalokitesvara".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [nán]
["Guangyun" Na Hanqie, Pingtan, Clay. ]
(1) Location name. Contrast with "North".
(2) South; Southland.
(3) In modern times, because developing countries are mostly in the southern hemisphere, Xi is called "south" and provinces are called "south"; developed countries are mostly in the northern hemisphere, and Xi is called "north" and provinces are called "north". Such as: North-South dialogue, South-South cooperation.
(4) Go south; go south.
(5) The name of ancient southern dance music.
(6) Official titles. Later, he was more of a "male".
(7) The name of the province of present-day Nanjing in the Ming Dynasty.
(8) The name given to women by ethnic minorities in Southwest my country.
(9) Last name. Tang You Nan Jiyun. See "New Book of Tang Dynasty: The Story of Loyalty and Righteousness".

["Guangyun" Na Hanqie, Pingtan, Clay. ]

Name meaning

南
nán
南
“南”原是乐器名和乐舞名。
《诗经》:“以雅以南”。从字形看像
一种钟形乐器,上端有纽可以悬
挂。后来多假借表示南方的“南”。
юг
юг
«Нан» изначально было названием музыкального инструмента, музыки и танца.
«Книга песен»: «К югу от Йия».
Со стороны купели это похоже на свисающий с нее музыкальный инструмент в форме колокола.
Позже его часто использовали для обозначения «юга» юга.
nán, nā
I nán
1) юг, зюйд (сторона света, в старой космогонии связывался с летом, стихией «огонь» 火, циклическим знаком 午 триграммой 离); южный; на юг; с юга (предшествует глаголу движения)
出南门 выйти из южных ворот
南去 отправиться на юг
南来 приехать с юга
南面 южная сторона; повернуться лицом на юг
长江以南 южнее р. Янцзы
2) южная часть (района, страны)
闽南 южная часть пров. Фуцзянь
华南 Южный Китай
3) * мелодия (музыка) южных инородцев
4) * государь, князь, правитель
5) Юг, Южный ветер (название камня в мацзяне)
庄家打的南 хозяин кона бросил (снёс) Южный ветер
5) Нань (общее название разделов 周南 и 召南, 1 — 25 песен «Шицзина»)
6) (сокр. вм. 南昌) Наньчан (город в пров. Цзянси)
南浔铁路 Наньчан — Цзюцзянская железная дорога
7) Нань (фамилия)
II nā
см. 南无

南

Значения

Юг

Мнемоника

  • Пробираться на юге страны через джунгли, раздвигая рогатиной 羊 свисающие 冂 и дающие новые побеги 十 лианы.

  • Два растения растут в саду с видом на юг.
Radicals: 十, 冂, 干  (cross, head, dry, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
The cross you're holding above your head to keep your horns dry keeps pulling you south. Probably because it's warmer and less damp down south.
Look down and see the compass pointing south and feel the cross pulling you in that direction.
Reading Mnemonic
You finally make it down south, and it is dry, but you're really hungry. When you try to find southern food you realize every single store is only selling naan (なん).
Imagine being in the south and taking big bites of naan. It tastes good, but now your mouth is dry just like your horns. Too dry...

并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 十 (десять), 干 (сухой)
Стороны света: 北 [きた] север, 南 [みなみ] юг, 西 [にし] запад, 東 [ひがし] восток.
